trans-unit.source: Contains methods used for transaction management.
trans-unit.target: 包含用于事务管理的方法。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: This class contains static properties and methods used to obtain information about the default transaction options.
trans-unit.target: 此类包含静态属性和方法用于获取事务处理选项的默认值有关的信息。

trans-unit.source: It also contains several static methods used for recovery of a durable resource when the durable resource fails.
trans-unit.target: 它还包含用于恢复的持久的资源，持久资源失败时的若干静态方法。

trans-unit.source: No special action is required of a durable resource if the Microsoft Distributed Transaction Coordinator (MSDTC) fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft 分布式事务处理协调器 (MSDTC) 失败，不不需要持久资源的任何特殊操作。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default timeout interval for new transactions.
trans-unit.target: 获取新事务的默认超时的间隔。

trans-unit.source: The timeout interval of a transaction is the time within which the transaction must be completed.
trans-unit.target: 事务的超时时间间隔是必须在其中完成该事务的时间。

trans-unit.source: If the transaction manager has not heard from all transaction participants within the timeout interval, it aborts the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果事务管理器在超时间隔内未收到来自所有事务参与者，它会中止的事务。

trans-unit.source: This value can be set in the `DefaultSettingsSection` of the config file.
trans-unit.target: 可以将此值设置`DefaultSettingsSection`的配置文件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> value that specifies the timeout interval for new transactions.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeSpan>值，该值指定新事务的超时间隔。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a distributed transaction has started.
trans-unit.target: 指示已开始分布式的事务。

trans-unit.source: **Caution** Signing up for this event degrades the performance of all distributed transactions.
trans-unit.target: **警告︰**注册此事件，从而降低服务器的所有分布式事务的性能。

trans-unit.source: Local transactions are not monitored as performance is affected even more.
trans-unit.target: 如性能影响更多，不会监视本地事务。

trans-unit.source: **Note** This method uses <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction> to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; however, only the immediate caller is required to possess the `FullTrust` permission set.
trans-unit.target: **请注意**此方法使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>，防止它不受信任的代码中调用; 但是，仅限直接调用方需要拥有`FullTrust`权限集。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom transaction factory.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置自定义事务工厂。

trans-unit.source: **Note** This method uses <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction> to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; however, only the immediate caller is required to possess the `FullTrust` permission set.
trans-unit.target: **请注意**此方法使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>，防止它不受信任的代码中调用; 但是，仅限直接调用方需要拥有`FullTrust`权限集。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Transactions.HostCurrentTransactionCallback"></xref> that contains a custom transaction factory.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Transactions.HostCurrentTransactionCallback"> </xref> ，包含自定义事务工厂。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default maximum timeout interval for new transactions.
trans-unit.target: 获取新事务的默认最大超时的间隔。

trans-unit.source: For an explanation of the timeout interval, see the documentation for the <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionManager.DefaultTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 超时间隔的说明，请参阅的文档<xref:System.Transactions.TransactionManager.DefaultTimeout%2A>属性。</xref:System.Transactions.TransactionManager.DefaultTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: This value can be set in the `MachineSettingsSection` of the config file.
trans-unit.target: 可以将此值设置`MachineSettingsSection`的配置文件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> value that specifies the maximum timeout interval that is allowed when creating new transactions.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeSpan>值，该值指定创建新事务时允许的最大超时间隔。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the transaction manager that a resource manager recovering from failure has finished reenlisting in all unresolved transactions.
trans-unit.target: 通知事务管理器资源管理器从故障中恢复已完成所有未解决的事务中登记。

trans-unit.source: All durable resource managers should do recovery when they first start up by calling the <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionManager.Reenlist%2A> method for each outstanding transaction.
trans-unit.target: 所有持久资源管理器应执行恢复时在首次启动通过调用<xref:System.Transactions.TransactionManager.Reenlist%2A>对于每个未完成事务的方法。</xref:System.Transactions.TransactionManager.Reenlist%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only when all of the reenlistments are done should the resource manager call RecoveryComplete.
trans-unit.target: 仅当所有 reenlistments 完成资源管理器应调用 RecoveryComplete。

trans-unit.source: For more information on recovery, see [Performing Recovery](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d342c5c7-da64-4a4c-8e63-b52f4fbf2691).
trans-unit.target: 有关恢复的详细信息，请参阅[执行恢复](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d342c5c7-da64-4a4c-8e63-b52f4fbf2691)。

trans-unit.source: **Note** This method uses <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction> to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; however, only the immediate caller is required to possess the `FullTrust` permission set.
trans-unit.target: **请注意**此方法使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>，防止它不受信任的代码中调用; 但是，仅限直接调用方需要拥有`FullTrust`权限集。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> that uniquely identifies the resource to be recovered from.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Guid>唯一标识要从恢复的资源。</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The resourceManagerIdentifier parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The resourceManagerIdentifier parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Reenlists a durable participant in a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 重新登记在事务中的持久参与者。

trans-unit.source: A resource manager facilitates resolution of durable enlistments in a transaction by reenlisting the transaction participant after resource failure.
trans-unit.target: 资源管理器通过在资源失败之后登记事务参与者来促进的在事务中的持久登记的解决。

trans-unit.source: The `resourceManagerIdentifier` parameter is used to consistently label the participant of a transaction in the event of a resource failure.
trans-unit.target: `resourceManagerIdentifier`参数用于一致地标记资源失败时事务的参与者。

trans-unit.source: When calling the Reenlist method, the resource manager must provide the same `resourceManagerIdentifier` as it used when it originally called the <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.EnlistDurable%2A> method during enlistment, or a <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 调用重新登记在方法时，资源管理器必须提供相同`resourceManagerIdentifier`作为它最初调用时，使用<xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.EnlistDurable%2A>期间登记，方法或<xref:System.Transactions.TransactionException>引发。</xref:System.Transactions.TransactionException> </xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.EnlistDurable%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a participant is reenlisted using this method, the phase 2 methods of <xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification> that correspond to the transaction's outcome (that is, <xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.Commit%2A> , <xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.Rollback%2A> or <xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.InDoubt%2A> ) are called as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 当重新登记参与者时使用此方法的第 2 阶段方法<xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification>对应于事务的结果 (即， <xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.Commit%2A>，<xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.Rollback%2A>或<xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.InDoubt%2A>) 相应地调用。</xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.InDoubt%2A> </xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.Rollback%2A> </xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.Commit%2A> </xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification>

trans-unit.source: After the participants are successfully reenlisted, you should then call <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionManager.RecoveryComplete%2A> to complete the recovery.
trans-unit.target: 参与者已成功重新登记后，应调用<xref:System.Transactions.TransactionManager.RecoveryComplete%2A>完成恢复。</xref:System.Transactions.TransactionManager.RecoveryComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: You should only call this method when a resource manager restarts from failure.
trans-unit.target: 资源管理器重新启动从故障时，仅应调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: In addition, you should only reenlist unresolved transactions logged by a resource manager during the initial Prepare phase of a two-phase commit.
trans-unit.target: 此外，应该仅重新登记在两阶段提交的初始准备阶段中由资源管理器记录的未解析的事务。

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to call this method at invalid times can produce erroneous results.
trans-unit.target: 任何尝试在无效的时间调用此方法可以产生错误的结果。

trans-unit.source: If the transaction manager fails, and your resource manager performs recovery only a short time after you called the <xref:System.Transactions.PreparingEnlistment.Prepared%2A> method on an enlistment in phase 1 of the Two-Phase Commit protocol, your resource manager might either receive the <xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.InDoubt%2A> or <xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.Rollback%2A> callback.
trans-unit.target: 如果事务管理器失败，并且你的资源管理器执行恢复只在短时间调用后<xref:System.Transactions.PreparingEnlistment.Prepared%2A>第 1 阶段中的两阶段提交协议的登记的方法，资源管理器可能会收到<xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.InDoubt%2A>或<xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.Rollback%2A>回调。</xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.Rollback%2A> </xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.InDoubt%2A> </xref:System.Transactions.PreparingEnlistment.Prepared%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on recovery, see [Performing Recovery](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d342c5c7-da64-4a4c-8e63-b52f4fbf2691).
trans-unit.target: 有关恢复的详细信息，请参阅[执行恢复](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d342c5c7-da64-4a4c-8e63-b52f4fbf2691)。

trans-unit.source: **Note** This method uses <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction> to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; however, only the immediate caller is required to possess the `FullTrust` permission set.
trans-unit.target: **请注意**此方法使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>，防止它不受信任的代码中调用; 但是，仅限直接调用方需要拥有`FullTrust`权限集。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> that uniquely identifies the resource manager.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Guid>唯一标识资源管理器。</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Contains additional information of recovery information.
trans-unit.target: 包含恢复信息的其他的信息。

trans-unit.source: A resource object that implements <xref href="System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification"></xref> to receive notifications.
trans-unit.target: 资源实现的对象， <xref href="System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification"> </xref>以接收通知。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Transactions.Enlistment"></xref> that describes the enlistment.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Transactions.Enlistment"> </xref>描述登记。

trans-unit.source: recoveryInformation is invalid.
trans-unit.target: recoveryInformation是无效的。

trans-unit.source: -or- Transaction Manager information in recoveryInformation does not match the configured transaction manager.
trans-unit.target: -或-事务管理器中的信息recoveryInformation与已配置的事务管理器不匹配。

trans-unit.source: -or- RecoveryInformation is not recognized by .
trans-unit.target: -RecoveryInformation无法识别的 。

trans-unit.source: has already been called for the specified resourceManagerIdentifier.
trans-unit.target: 已调用指定 resourceManagerIdentifier 。

trans-unit.source: The reenlistment is rejected.
trans-unit.target: 重新登记被拒绝。

trans-unit.source: The resourceManagerIdentifier does not match the content of the specified recovery information in recoveryInformation.
trans-unit.target: resourceManagerIdentifier 与中的指定的恢复信息的内容不匹配 recoveryInformation 。
